descriptions.400: Your signal was corrupted. The underground network couldn't decode your request.
descriptions.401: You need proper credentials to access this secret location.
descriptions.402: Entry fee required for this exclusive underground spot.
descriptions.403: This area is off-limits. Even renegades have boundaries.
descriptions.404: This route doesn't exist in the underground network.
descriptions.405: That method won't work down here. Try a different approach.
descriptions.406: The format you requested isn't supported in this sector.
descriptions.408: Your connection to the underground timed out. The signal was lost.
descriptions.409: There's a conflict in the underground network. Two signals can't occupy the same space.
descriptions.410: This location was shut down permanently. The rave moved on.
descriptions.413: Your data packet is too large for the underground channels.
descriptions.429: Slow down! You're pinging the network too frequently.
descriptions.500: The underground server crashed. Even renegades have technical difficulties.
descriptions.502: The gateway to this sector is malfunctioning.
descriptions.503: The underground network is temporarily offline. Maintenance in progress.
descriptions.504: The gateway timed out trying to reach this location.
descriptions.default: Something went wrong in the underground.
